short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adjust video volume with precision using keyboard shortcuts on rumble.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your video watching experience with Volume Voyager, the ultimate Chrome extension for seamless and precise volume control. Say goodbye to mouse adjustments and hello to effortless keyboard navigation through your favorite videos.

Key Features:

Volume Control: Easily adjust the volume of any video on the page using the + and -  keys. Whether you're looking to increase the volume for an action-packed scene or decrease it for quiet dialogue, Volume Voyager offers you the precision you need without interrupting your viewing experience.

Video Navigation: Skip ahead or rewind your video content in 5-second increments with a simple tap of the Right/Left arrow keys. Perfect for skipping intros or replaying a crucial moment without fumbling for the progress bar.

Sleek Popup Interface: With a minimalist and user-friendly popup, you can quickly learn about the extension's features and how to use them without having to leave your browser window.

Lightweight and Privacy-Friendly: This extension doesn't run in the background, ensuring minimal resource usage and maximum privacy.

Whether you're a movie buff, a music lover, or a habitual binge-watcher, Volume Voyager is tailored to enhance your media consumption without complexity. Install now and embark on a journey of effortless video control!
